title: Scheduled Power On/Off?
content:
Hi everyone,

I wanted to know if Pixel phones - have the "Scheduled Power on/off" feature that was available on Android 8. Android 11 just came out and I've been looking to see if this feature has made a comeback. I know Pixel phones have the "Bedtime Schedule" feature, but the Grayscale + Do Not Disturb features alone aren't really what I'm looking for. I thought it would have an option to automate shutdown, but I couldn't find it. Does anyone know if the "scheduled power on/off" is back - or a way I can enable it? 

I have a Pixel 3aXL right now, but my previous phone (not a pixel) ran on Android 8 and had this feature.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
